episodes.title: Doing My Makeup While I Tell You About the Time A Cult Tried to Exorcise Me | GRWM & Storytime
episodes.description:
Doing My Makeup While I Tell You About the Time A Cult Tried to Exorcise Me | GRWM & Storytime. Thanks to Grow Therapy for sponsoring this video! Head to https://growtherapy.yt.link/olZZWFl to find your estimate and get started today! In today's video I'm finally deep diving into my cult-like upbringing- from people rolling on the floor during service, to sermons about the end times every other sunday. I have so many stories about being in a cult for basically the first 16 years of my life. In this video I specifically talk about when my church thought I was demon possessed and tried exercising me mid-service in front of the whole congregation, of course all while doing my makeup to distract from the trauma of course lol. Let's get into this crazy storytime and get ready with me!

episodes.title: TikTok’s Cult “Children of the Waning Star” Was Chaos And Leader Gigi Jarvis Blames YOU for Joining
episodes.description:
Thanks to Match Masters for sponsoring this video. Download Match Masters for free now and join the star race to be entered in this exciting giveaway! https://go.matchmasters.com/hCkF/ekn9v4fy
T&Cs can be found at @matchmastersofficial. This giveaway is not affiliated with Youtube or any of the brands from which the prizes are from. MatchMastersPartner

TikTok’s Cult “Children of the Waning Star” Was Chaos And Leader Gigi Jarvis Blames YOU for Joining. In today's video we will be doing a deep dive and deep analysis of the very short-lived yet chaotic Tiktok cult children of the waning star started by tiktok creator Gigi Jarvis who also happens to be a model, actress and a scholar who has literally studied in sociology, power dynamics & so much more classes that set off all types of alarms. From telling her followers she wants to be a cult leader, telling them what to call themselves, choosing emojis to represent them, to saying she'll break into their homes if they don't obey, this tiktok children of the waning star cult quickly went from a community joke to something extremely dark really fast. But this is so much more than just a tiktok trend gone bad, it really shows us the power of social media, the romanization of cults and how easy it is to take advantage of people who lack 3rd spaces via para-social relationships online and making cults seem like something quirky and cute- instead of what they really are: scary, controlling and straight up wrong. And I'm here to give all the details, let's get into this!

episodes.title: Big TikTok Families Like "TheCollins" Say It’s a Sin To Not Have 12 Kids- Because They’re In A Cult.
episodes.description:
Big TikTok Families Like "TheCollins" Say It’s a Sin To Not Have 12 Kids- Because They’re In A Cult...In Todays video we will be deep diving into the cult like world of religious big influencer families and the indoctrination people like Karissa Collins spread on Instagram and tiktok. The Cult of romanticizing having big families needs to stop- especially if religion has a role in it. From overly religious big family influencers like Ballerina Farm, Nara Smith to Karissa Collins- they all play a role in a much bigger idea- the idea that if you don't make bread from home, have 12 kids and preach extremist religious views, that you're not holy enough. Such as the Collinsfamily mother Karissa Collins forcing her family to make toxic tiktoks repeating this indoctronation. The truth is that these family "holy" channels, tikoks and content creators are far from holy, it more so seems like neglect, extremism and at this point a cult! Let's chat.

TikTok’s Thinness-Obsessed Community “SkinnyTok” Isn’t Making You Healthier - It’s a Cult... In today's video we will be deep diving into the world of skinnytok, liv schmidt and the secret cult hidden inside the community that's made over $150,000. From “What I Eat in a Day” videos to toxic “body check” content, SkinnyTok doesn’t promote health — it promotes obsession, control, and disordered thinking disguised as wellness. Let's deep dive into how social media algorithms, aesthetic trends, and community reinforcement create a digital cult around weight loss and body image.

In this video, I deep dive into the world of religious and spiritual influencers, tiktokers, youtubers and more. I also share why people like ballerina farm, bignik, rhett from good mythical morning, and girl defined, either stay in this world or choose to leave it. It's so much more deep, complex, and confusing than one would think, and I understand why. I grew up in a cult, and this is my story why choosing to either to stay or leave this world- is a difficult one.
